createdon.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

emailaddress1.description: Type the primary email address for the contact.

modifiedon.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

ownerid.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

parentcustomerid.description: Select the parent account or parent contact for the contact to provide a quick link to additional details, such as financial information, activities, and opportunities.

telephone1.description: Type the main phone number for this contact.
